content: Recurrence of right ring finger trigger finger
title: Chief Complaint

content: Patient presents for follow-up regarding thumb CMC arthritis and right ring finger trigger finger. She reports doing well with her thumb CMC arthritis and has adapted to manage life with it. However, her right ring finger trigger finger has recurred, with symptoms starting around 2020-2021. She initially hoped it might resolve but it has progressed into a full trigger finger. She inquires about the next steps for management.
title: HPI Spencer

content: mild tenderness to palpation of the right thumb CMC joint
triggering noted at the right ring finger
title: Musculoskeletal

content: Continue current management for thumb CMC arthritis.
Proceed with surgical release for right ring finger trigger finger.
Continue night splinting for right ring finger.
title: Plan
